@graph.name: annotator
@graph.label: annotator
@graph.description: The participant produced an annotation of this or a related resource.

@graph.name: author
@graph.label: author
@graph.description: The participant contributed original writings to the resource.

@graph.name: compiler
@graph.label: compiler
@graph.description: The participant is responsible for collecting the sub-parts of the resource together.

@graph.name: consultant
@graph.label: consultant
@graph.description: The participant contributes expertise to the creation of a work.

@graph.name: data_inputter
@graph.label: data inputter
@graph.description: The participant was responsible for entering, re-typing, and/or structuring the data contained in the resource.

@graph.name: depositor
@graph.label: depositor
@graph.description: The participant was responsible for depositing the resource in an archive.

@graph.name: developer
@graph.label: developer
@graph.description: The participant developed the methodology or tools that constitute the resource, or that were used to create the resource.

@graph.name: editor
@graph.label: editor
@graph.description: The participant reviewed, corrected, and/or tested the resource.

@graph.name: illustrator
@graph.label: illustrator
@graph.description: The participant contributed drawings or other illustrations to the resource.

@graph.name: interpreter
@graph.label: interpreter
@graph.description: The participant translates in real-time or explains the discourse recorded in the resource.

@graph.name: interviewer
@graph.label: interviewer
@graph.description: The participant conducted an interview that forms part of the resource.

@graph.name: participant
@graph.label: participant
@graph.description: The participant was present during the creation of the resource, but did not contribute substantially to its content.

@graph.name: performer
@graph.label: performer
@graph.description: The participant performed some portion of a recorded, filmed, or transcribed resource.

@graph.name: photographer
@graph.label: photographer
@graph.description: The participant took the photograph, or shot the film, that appears in or constitutes the resource.

@graph.name: recorder
@graph.label: recorder
@graph.description: The participant operated the recording machinery used to create the resource.

@graph.name: researcher
@graph.label: researcher
@graph.description: The resource was created as part of the participant's research, or the research presents interim or final results from the participant's research.

@graph.name: research_participant
@graph.label: research participant
@graph.description: The participant acted as a research subject or responded to a questionnaire, the results of which study form the basis of the resource.

@graph.name: responder
@graph.label: responder
@graph.description: The participant was an interlocutor in some sort of discourse event.

@graph.name: signer
@graph.label: signer
@graph.description: The participant was a principal signer in a resource that consists of a recording, a film, or a transcription of a recorded resource.

@graph.name: singer
@graph.label: singer
@graph.description: The participant sang, either individually or as part of a group, in a resource that consists of a recording, a film, or a transcription of a recorded resource.

@graph.name: speaker
@graph.label: speaker
@graph.description: The participant was a principal speaker in a resource that consists of a recording, a film, or a transcription of a recorded resource.

@graph.name: sponsor
@graph.label: sponsor
@graph.description: The participant contributed financial support to the creation of the resource.

@graph.name: transcriber
@graph.label: transcriber
@graph.description: The participant produced a transcription of this or a related resource.

@graph.name: translator
@graph.label: translator
@graph.description: The participant produced a translation of this or a related resource.
